availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas K. Daugherty (Ballard County, Kentucky, carpenter.)

body.p: Also appears as "Dorothy" and "Dority." Ballard County, Kentucky, carpenter. Carpenter in Ballard County, Kentucky in 1850. Carpenter in Ballard County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard, Picketts, p. 621.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard, District 5, p. 435A.
KYR-0001-019-0078.
